name: Hemogothic
description:
Survive an endless arena and sacrifice your health for strength. Made for the 2022 July Reload Magazine jam

Programming by Zach: https://twitter.com/Zachtoplasm

Arm and Tile Art by Sugarflow: https://twitter.com/sugarfl0w?lang=en

Enemies by Connie: https://twitter.com/volt_girl?s=21&t=0MXZ3IPY286aDyT8aOBJ-Q

Controls:
Left-Click - Attack (hold for 1 second and release for a projectile if your sword has enough green blood coating)

Right-Click - Stab yourself. Stabbing with your knife summons your sword, stabbing with your sword puts it away and heals you based on how coated it is

WASD - move

Spacebar - jump
